title: 472: Akainu's Plot! Whitebeard Entrapped!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A detailed blog analysis of Episode 472, praising it as an A+, 10/10 episode. The author discusses the emotional impact of Whitebeard's forgiveness, Squard's backstory, and the philosophical themes about family and forgiveness.

title: WHITEBEARD IS A REAL ONE - One Piece Marineford Episode 472 AND 473 Live Reaction!
author: JennAnime Reactions
description: A live reaction video covering episodes 472 and 473 of the Marineford arc, focusing on Whitebeard's character and the emotional impact of his forgiveness of Squard.

title: THE END OF WHITEBEARD?! | One Piece Episode 472 REACTION
author: Various Reactors
description: A reaction video to Episode 472 focusing on the shocking moment when Squard stabs Whitebeard and the aftermath.

title: HOW COULD YOU?! TO POPS!! | One Piece Episode 472/473 Reaction
author: Anime Reactors
description: A reaction video expressing shock and emotion at Squard's betrayal of Whitebeard and the subsequent forgiveness.

title: Whitebeard Betrayed! One Piece REACTION - Episode 471 & 472
author: Anime Reaction Channel
description: A combined reaction to episodes 471 and 472, covering the buildup to and execution of Squard's betrayal.

title: Squard's Betrayal: The Heart of One Piece
author: @callyvizzle
description: A TikTok video explaining how Squard was deceived by Akainu into betraying Whitebeard, highlighting the emotional manipulation.

title: One Piece #472 - Akainu's Plot! Whitebeard Entrapped!
author: Comic Vine Community
description: Comic Vine database entry for Episode 472 with community reviews and ratings.
